Replace.Text: 拥有“保护地球”市政后提供1点 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。[ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成延伸到4个单元格中的每个市中心。此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，因此市中心4个单元格以内相同的此建筑不会再额外提供加成。

Provides 1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism after advancing to the Conservation Civic. [ICON_Amenities] Amenity extends to each city center within 4 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city, and multiple copies of this building within 4 tiles of a city center do not provide additional bonuses.
+2 [ICON_TOURISM]旅游业绩 [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] 宜居度和 [ICON_Culture] 文化值加成延伸到6个单元格中的每个市中心。此加成1座城市仅能应用1次，因此市中心6个单元格以内相同的此建筑不会再额外提供加成。

+2 [ICON_TOURISM]Tourism [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Amenities] Amenity and [ICON_Culture] Culture extends to each city center within 6 tiles. This bonus applies once to a city, and multiple copies of this building within 6 tiles of a city center do not provide additional bonuses.

该城市中训练的所有近战和远程陆地单位+25%战斗经验值。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+10（标准速度下）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]无法建造在已有马厩的军营区域中。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]本城的所有已开发的 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] 铁、 [ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] 铜资源+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。为在本城训练的近战、远程、反骑兵单位提供永久+3 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。

+25% combat experience for all melee and ranged land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each improved [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron and [ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] Copper resource in this city. +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat strength for all melee, ranged, anti-cavalry units trained in this city.

马其顿特色建筑。该城中训练的陆地近战、远程单位和伙友骑兵+25%战斗经验值。非平民单位在此城中创建时，获得等同于单位花费25%的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]战略资源储备+10（标准速度下）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]无法建造在已拥有马厩的军营区域中。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]本城的所有已开发的 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] 铁、 [ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] 铜资源+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。为在本城训练的近战、远程、反骑兵、攻城、伙友骑兵提供永久+3 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。

A building unique to Macedon.+25% combat experience for all melee, ranged land units, and Hetairoi trained in this city. Gain [ICON_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% of the unit's cost when a non civilian unit is created in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each improved [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron and [ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] Copper resource in this city. +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat strength for all land combat, ranged and Hetairoi trained in this city.

该城市中训练的所有骑兵类单位+25%战斗经验值。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+10（标准速度下）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]不能建造在已有兵营的军营区域中。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]本城的所有已开发的 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] 马+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。本城所有已开发的 [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] 牛、 [ICON_RESOURCE_SHEEP] 羊+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。为在本城训练的轻重骑兵、攻城单位提供永久+3 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。

+25% combat experience for all cavalry class units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Barracks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each improved [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses in this city. +1 [ICON_Food] Food to each improved [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] Cattle and [ICON_RESOURCE_SHEEP] Sheep in this city. +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat strength for all light and heavy cavalry units and siege units trained in this city.

蒙古特色建筑。其所在城市中训练的轻重骑兵单位 [ICON_MOVEMENT] 移动力+1。其所在城市中训练的所有骑兵类单位战斗经验值+25%。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+10（标准速度下）。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]无法建造在已拥有兵营的军营区域中。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]本城的所有已开发的 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] 马资源+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，本城所有已开发的 [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] 牛、 [ICON_RESOURCE_SHEEP] 羊资源+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。为在本城训练的轻重骑兵、怯薛歹提供永久+3 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。

A building unique to Mongolia. Grants an ability that gives +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement to Heavy and Light Cavalry trained in this city. +25% combat experience for all cavalry class units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Barracks.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each improved [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses and +1 [ICON_Food] Food to each improved [ICON_RESOURCE_CATTLE] Cattle and [ICON_RESOURCE_SHEEP] Sheep in this city. +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat strength for all cavalry units and Keshig trained in this city.
允许使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买建造者。允许购买传教士（只能使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值进行购买）。本城的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+5%。
Allows the purchasing of Builders using [ICON_Faith] Faith. Allows the purchasing of Missionaries (can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith). +5% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city.
允许使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买开拓者。允许购买使徒、上师、审判官，拥有特定信仰还可购买武僧（这些宗教单位只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买）。本城的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+10%。

Allows the purchasing of Settlers using [ICON_Faith] Faith. Allows the purchasing, Apostles, Gurus, Inquisitors, and with the proper belief, Warrior Monks(these units can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith). +10% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city.
高棉特色建筑，取代寺庙。允许使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买开拓者。允许购买使徒、上师、审判官，拥有特定信仰还可购买武僧（这些宗教单位只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买）。在此城中购买的传教士拥有能力“殉道者”：此单位在神学战争中死去后将获得一个 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] 遗物。本城的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+10%。

A building unique to Khmer. Allows the purchasing of Settlers using [ICON_Faith] Faith. Allows the purchasing, Apostles, Gurus, Inquisitors, and with the proper belief, Warrior Monks(these units can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith). Missionaries purchased in this city receive the Martyr ability which grants a [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic if this Missionary dies in Theological Combat. +10% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city.
挪威特色建筑。取代寺庙。允许使用 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买开拓者。允许购买使徒、上师、审判官，拥有特定信仰还可购买武僧（这些宗教单位只能通过 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值购买）。圣地区域可从树林获得额外的标准相邻加成。城市中每个海岸资源单元格+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。本城的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值+10%。

A building unique to Norway. Allows the purchasing of Settlers using [ICON_Faith] Faith. Allows the purchasing, Apostles, Gurus, Inquisitors, and with the proper belief, Warrior Monks(these units can only be purchased with [ICON_Faith] Faith). Holy Site districts get an additional standard adjacency bonus from Woods. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each coastal resource tile in this city. +10% [ICON_Faith] Faith in this city.
该城市中训练的所有陆地单位+25%战斗经验值。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+10（标准速度下）。为本城所有的 [ICON_Resource_Niter] 硝石、 [ICON_Resource_Oil] 石油资源+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。

+25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed). +1 [ICON_Production] Production to all [ICON_Resource_Niter] Niter and [ICON_Resource_Oil] Oil in this city.

此城中训练的所有陆地单位+25%战斗经验值。[NEWLINE]战略资源储备+10（标准速度下）。[NEWLINE]可直接训练军团和军队。军团和军队的训练费用降低25%。为本城的 [ICON_Resource_Aluminum] 铝、 [ICON_Resource_Uranium] 铀资源+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。本城的 [ICON_GREATGENERAL] 大将军点数积累速度+50%，且所有训练的陆地单位+3 [ICON_STRENGTH] 战斗力。

+25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.[NEWLINE]Strategic Resource Stockpiles increased +10 (on Standard Speed).[NEWLINE]Allows Corps and Armies to be trained directly. Corps and Army training costs reduced 25%. +1 [ICON_Production] Production to all [ICON_Resource_Aluminum] Aluminum and [ICON_Resource_Uranium] Uranium in this city.+50% accumulation rate for [ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great General Points in this city. +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for all land units trained in this city.
所有城市+2 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度、+3 [ICON_Housing] 住房。[NEWLINE]奖励1个 [Icon_Governor] 总督头衔。
+2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity and +3 [ICON_Housing] Housing in all cities [NEWLINE]Awards +1 [Icon_Governor] Governor Title.
阿拉伯特色建筑。提供与学院区的相邻加成等量的 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。[NEWLINE] 其科技值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值+10%。

A building unique to Arabia. Bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to the adjacency bonus of the Campus district. Its [ICON_SCIENCE] Science bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in this city.
毛利特色建筑。城市中所有包含可通行地貌或自然奇观的单元格+1 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值与 [ICON_FAITH] 信仰值。研究“飞行”科技后，城市中所有包含地貌或自然奇观的单元格+1 [ICON_TOURISM] 旅游业绩。维护免费；无巨作槽位。本城 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值+5%。

A building unique to the Māori. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_FAITH] Faith to all of this city's tiles with a passable feature or natural wonder. After Flight is researched receive +1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism to all of this city's tiles with a feature or natural wonder. Costs no maintenance. Has no Great Work slots.[NEWLINE]Its [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus is extended to all City Centers within 4 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +5% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this city.
可存放 [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] 文物。如果在剧院广场区域已经有一座艺术博物馆则无法修建。[NEWLINE]其 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值+10%。

Holds [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts. May not be built in a Theater Square district that already has an Art Museum.Its [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this city.
可存放 [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] 艺术巨作。如果在剧院广场区域已经有一座考古博物馆则无法修建。[NEWLINE]其 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值+10%。

Holds [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Works of Art. May not be built in a Theater Square district that already has an Archaeological Museum. Its [ICON_CULTURE] Culture bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this city.
美国特色建筑。对进入现代的文明，本城+100% [ICON_Tourism] 旅游业绩。其 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值+10%。通电后额外为本城+10% [ICON_CULTURE] 文化值.

A building unique to America. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism pressure from this city towards other civilizations in the Modern era. +10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in this city. +10% [ICON_CULTURE] culture if the city is fully powered.
+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。本城 [ICON_GOLD] 金币产出+5%。
+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. +5% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in this city.
波兰特色建筑。从此城开始的国际 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线+2 [ICON_Production] 生产力；国内 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币。+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。本城 [ICON_GOLD] 金币产出+5%。

A building unique to Poland. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +2 [ICON_Production] Production; domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. +5% [ICON_GOLD] Gold yield in this city.
奥斯曼特色建筑。城市中改良的每种不同战略资源均可额外增加1点。城市改良的每个奢侈品资源均可提供1点 [ICON_AMENITIES] 宜居度。其 [ICON_GOLD] 金币加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_GOLD] 金币产出+10%。

A building unique to the Ottomans. Accumulate 1 extra Strategic resource for every different type of Strategic resource this city has improved. Receive 1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for every Luxury resource this city has improved. +10% [ICON_gold] Gold yield in this city.
其 [ICON_Production] 生产力加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。为本城的 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤资源+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力，本城建造区域、建筑和奇观+10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。本城每个人口获得0.3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。

Its [ICON_Production] Production bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type.+1[ICON_Production] production for each [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal in this city, +10% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders, districts and buildings in this city. Each citizen +0.3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in this city.

日本特色建筑。研究“电力”科技后为此城市提供+4 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。其 [ICON_Production] 生产力加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。为本城的 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤资源+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力，本城建造区域、建筑和奇观+10% [ICON_Production] 生产力。本城每个人口获得0.3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。

A building unique to Japan. Provides +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture to this city after researching the Electricity technology. Its [ICON_Production] Production bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] coal in this city, +10% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders, districts and buildings in this city.Each citizen +0.3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in this city.

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围6个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤 [ICON_PowerRight] 4点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放大量二氧化碳。[NEWLINE]本城建造区域、建筑和奇观+20% [ICON_Production] 生产力。

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 6 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal [ICON_PowerRight] 4 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Heavy CO2 into the atmosphere.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders, districts and buildings in this city.

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围6个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油 [ICON_PowerRight] 4点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放中量二氧化碳[NEWLINE]其 [ICON_Production] 生产力加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成）。[NEWLINE]本城建造区域、建筑和奇观+20% [ICON_Production] 生产力。

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 6 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil [ICON_PowerRight] 4 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Moderate CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE]Its [ICON_Production] Production bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders, districts and buildings in this city.

将任意数额的 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀自动转换为 [ICON_Power] 电力，每回合可为周围6个单元格内的城市提供其所需电力：[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1点 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] 铀 [ICON_PowerRight] 16点 [ICON_Power] 电力[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]会向大气层排放少量二氧化碳[NEWLINE]建成后发生核事故的概率会随着核电站老化而增加。其 [ICON_Production] 生产力和 [ICON_Science] 科技值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的“发电厂”建筑获得加成。）。[NEWLINE]本城建造区域、建筑和奇观+20% [ICON_Production] 生产力。

Automatically converts any amount of [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium into [ICON_Power] Power for cities within 6 tiles that need it each turn, at the rate of:[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium [ICON_PowerRight] 16 [ICON_Power] Power[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Miniscule CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE]Once built, as a Nuclear Power Plant ages, there is an increased chance for a Nuclear Accident to occur. Its [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_Science] Science bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from a Power Plant building.[NEWLINE]+20% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders, districts and buildings in this city.
可再生水源向城市提供+6点 [ICON_Power] 电力。本城所有的沿河单元格+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
Provides the city +6 [ICON_Power] Power from renewable water sources.+1 [ICON_Production] Production to all tiles that are adjacent to river in this city.

此城生产的所有海军单位+25%战斗经验值。此城的所有海岸单元格+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。如此城与海岸或湖边相邻，则+2 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房。+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。为本城的 [ICON_Resource_Fish] 鱼、 [ICON_Resource_Crabs] 螃蟹、 [ICON_Resource_Whales] 鲸鱼、 [ICON_Resource_Pearls] 珍珠资源地块+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力.

+25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. +1 [ICON_Food] Food on all Coast tiles for this city. +2 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing if this city is adjacent to coast and lake. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity. +1 [ICON_Production] Production to each [ICON_Resource_Fish] Fish, [ICON_Resource_Crabs] Crabs, [ICON_Resource_Whales] Whales, [ICON_Resource_Pearls] Pearls resource in this city.
每人口消耗 [ICON_Food] 粮食由3变成2.5。为本城已开发的 [ICON_Resource_Bananas] 香蕉、 [ICON_Resource_Deer] 鹿 +1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
[ICON_Food] Food consumption of each citizen reduce to 2.5. +1 [ICON_Food] Food to each improved [ICON_Resource_Bananas] Banana and [ICON_Resource_Deer] deer.
其[ICON_SCIENCE]科技值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值+10%。
Its [ICON_SCIENCE] Science bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in this city.
每个人口产出0.5 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值，本城产出的 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值+5%。
Each citizen provides 0.5 extra [ICON_SCIENCE] Science. +5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in this city.
其 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值加成延伸到6个单元格内的所有市中心（前提是其尚未从其他的此建筑获得加成）。本城 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值+10%。通电后额外为本城+10% [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。

Its [ICON_SCIENCE] Science bonus is extended to all City Centers within 6 tiles that do not already have a bonus from this building type. +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science in this city. +10% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science if the city is fully powered.

此城中生产的所有海军单位+25%经验值。可直接生产舰队和无敌舰队。舰队和无敌舰队的生产费用降低25%。此城所有海岸单元格产出的 [ICON_GOLD] 金币+2。 本城的 [ICON_GREATADMIRAL] 海军将领点数积累速度+50%，且所有训练的海军单位+3 [ICON_STRENGTH] 战斗力。

+25% combat experience for air units trained in this city. +2 air unit slot in Aerodrome district.+50% [Icon_Production] Production towards Air Units.
